details: Device rebooted unexpectedly while streaming video.

root_cause_analysis.hardware: iPhone 6 Plus (A8 Chip, 1GB RAM) running iOS 12.5.7
root_cause_analysis.symptom: Battery level dropped from ~60% to 1% instantly, followed by shutdown.
root_cause_analysis.diagnosis: Voltage Sag (Battery Aging/Protection). High concurrent load (Python Backend + Video Decoding) caused voltage dip below threshold.

impact: Jailbreak lost. SSH access lost. Server stopped.

description: Video list in 'All' category remains stuck on 'Parsing...' spinner.
hypothesis: Background caching thread might be holding a stale or partial state, or network timeout without error handling.
fix_implemented: Added client-side timeout (Promise.race) and 'Refresh' button to force clear cache.
status: Fix implemented in codebase but DEPLOYMENT PENDING due to device crash.
